title: Produce Flame
content: e, called Produce Flame: Hurl. This Action will have the Druid hurl the blue flame to an area within the range of nine meters. Any Enemies that are hit by this Action will be taking a small amount of fire damage. As far as simple Cantrips go, Produce Flame is a good one to have as it provides both utility and a little bit of damage, whereas others might just provide one or the other. Produce Flame could be used in conjunction with the likes of Flame Blade or Flaming Sphere, especially through ju
